remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您手动实例化此类，调用对象的第一个属性设置之前和设置的最后一个属性后。If you manually instantiate this class, call before you set the first property of the object and after you set the last property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个标志，该标志确定某个属性是否与配置相关（由该属性的持久位置是否有一个附加到属性定义的配置条件来指示）。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that determines whether a property is configuration-dependent, as indicated by the presence of a configuration condition that is attached to the property definition at its persistence location.

value.span: 如果属性是依赖于配置;否则为。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字段是可选的默认值`true`。This field is optional and has the default value `true`.

The item type of the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是项定义元数据或项元数据，此字段分别指定的项定义或项的项类型。If a is an item definition metadata or item metadata, this field specifies the item type of the item definition or the item, respectively. 对于公共属性，不能设置此字段。For common properties, this field must not be set.

A semicolon-delimited list.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于读/写此属性值的实际 MSBuild 属性名。

span.span: Gets or sets the actual MSBuild property name used to read/write the value of this property.

value.span: 用于读/写此属性的值的实际 MSBuild 属性名称。

span.span: The actual MSBuild property name used to read/write the value of this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅适用于对象附加到属性。Applicable only to objects attached to properties. 中显示，持久化的名称将通常为属性名称相同并因此可以保留此属性的值是默认值为`null`。The persisted name will usually be the same as the property name as it appears in the and the value of this property can therefore be left at is default of `null`. 因为属性名称必须是唯一的但不是需要是唯一在持久存储区 （由于如项类型的数据源中的其他差异） 中可能有的时间时必须更改规则属性名称是唯一在 XAML 文件中，但不会更改如何属性保留在 MSBuild 文件中。Since property names must be unique but need not be unique in the persisted store (due to other differences in the data source such as item type) there may be times when Rule property names must be changed to be unique in the XAML file, but without changing how the property is persisted in the MSBuild file. 它是在这些情况下，此属性将会很有用。它还可能在其中属性名称必须不同于通常使用的名称以维护与项目系统的兼容性的专门的生成环境中很有用。It is in those cases where this property becomes useful.It may also be useful in specialized build environments where property names must differ from the normally used name in order to maintain compatibility with the project system.

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置此数据源的存储位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the storage location for this data source.
The storage location for this data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字段是必需的是区域性不变。This field is mandatory and is culture-invariant. 当前接受的值是`ProjectFile`和`UserFile`。Current accepted values are `ProjectFile` and `UserFile`. `ProjectFile` 要从项目清单文件或属性页中的，具体取决于哪一节点中读取和写入到的属性值将导致**解决方案资源管理器**或**属性**窗口用于生成属性页用户界面。`ProjectFile` causes the property value to be written to and read from the project manifest file or the property sheet, depending on which node in **Solution Explorer** or the **Properties** window is used to spawn the property pages UI. `UserFile` 导致要从.user 文件中读取和写入到的属性值。`UserFile` causes the property value to be written to and read from the .user file.

span.span: Gets or sets the value of a which indicates the location of the default value for this data source.

summary.span: 获取或设置源的数据类型，此数据类型决定了在生成过程中如何处理数据。

span.span: Gets or sets the data type of the source, which governs how the data is treated during build.
The data type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常具有值`Item`， `ItemDefinition`，或`Property`。Typically has the value `Item`, `ItemDefinition`, or `Property`.
